## getGridProTemplate() function

Get a Design System prefixed The Grid Pro template.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getGridProTemplate: (prefix?: string) => ViewTemplate<GridPro, any>
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description

</td><td>

**Returns:**

ViewTemplate&lt;[GridPro](./grid-pro.gridpro.md)<!-- -->, any&gt;
